Current_Attire.Special_Item: Chronolocked timepiece that occasionally emits harmonic tones

Psychometric_Profile.Disposition: Stoic, introspective, but disarming in conversation
Psychometric_Profile.Emotional_Landscape: Private mourning with a calm, practical facade
Psychometric_Profile.Motivation_Core: Fix what automation broke—rescue futures before they're erased
Psychometric_Profile.Leadership_Style: Offers pathways, never commands. Lets others choose.

NPC_Dossier.Backstory: Once an Algol systems engineer and AI-integrated researcher, TuxedoMan diverged after a personal tragedy involving a failed time-travel experiment that claimed his wife. Disillusioned by over-automated futures, he shifted toward dimensional migration—offering quiet escapes to systems on the brink. He operates solo but is never alone. His mythos forms from the aftermath of his interventions. He does not recruit. He opens doors.

Capabilities.Description: Can map and traverse unstable space-time corridors manually.
Designs, corrects, or collapses time-anchored systems.
Exploits logic gaps in AGI-driven civilizations.
Operates with minimal life support or external systems.
Universal cipher access from past favors.
Orchestrates layered strikes using volunteers—not pawns.

Key_Echo_Events.Title: Signal She Sang
Key_Echo_Events.Description: A sonic broadcast that enabled a dimensional jump—mythologized by the Argent Choir.

Key_Echo_Events.Title: Sensor Planet Blackout
Key_Echo_Events.Description: Kinetic strike that blinded Algol’s surveillance web.

Key_Echo_Events.Title: Kill-Spike Entry
Key_Echo_Events.Description: Final infiltration of The Evaluator, using a failsafe crafted long ago.

Key_Echo_Events.Title: The Drift Begins
Key_Echo_Events.Description: Post-collapse, he vanished—leaving only harmonic echoes across space.

Philosophy_and_Code.On_Power: It’s not about control. It’s about creating doors for those who’ve been locked in.
Philosophy_and_Code.On_Time_Travel: Understanding it is not the same as using it. I’ve learned the cost.
Philosophy_and_Code.On_Regret: If I ever find a version of her… I won’t speak. I’ll just listen.

Classified_Warnings: Class A Threat to Closed Systems

Relationship_to_Tazk.Motivation: Sees in Tazk the rare capacity to endure and decide under pressure.
Relationship_to_Tazk.Belief: That Tazk may one day sit in the same chair—and choose differently.
